message:
تفتكروا فى شبكة تواصل اجتماعى مصرية تقدر تنافس الفيسبوك بطريقه جديدة ؟
تفتكروا فى شركة هدفها خيرى ومجتمعى تقدر تستمر وتكسب فلوس ؟

تعرف على شركة 
NasHope
ناس هوب هيا شبكة تواصل اجتماعى وحلول تقنية للمجتمع المدنى 

مين يقدر يسجل فى ناس هوب
اى حد عايز يعمل خير او يتطوع
اى جمعية اهلية عايزه توصل لمتبرعين او متطوعين
اى طالب عايز يوصل للانشطة الطلابية فى جامعتة
اى شركة عايزه تفيد المجتمع
و كمان ممكن المطورين يطوروا برامج تفيد المجتمع 
الدعوات محدودة .. سارع بالتسجيل
www.nashope.com

#لسه_فى_أمل
#اكتشف_مجتمعك

https://www.facebook.com/NasHopeOfficial

data.message: I don't like the fact that the progress bar is fake. and why the whole website is not under SSL ?

The purple is abusive to look at.

Pick a language and stick to it, i18n doesn't mean having two languages on one page.
This also goes for the error modal which happens to be in English.

The error doesn't tell me what exactly did I do wrong and how can I fix it. Is my username unavailable? Can I use special characters in it?
Is my password too short?

Lose the flashing sign, how is the mascot related to the brand?

Where is the privacy policy?

Why are you turning off auto complete on a registration form that doesn't have any financially sensitive information?

Your client side validation is too out there (onsubmit) I broke it and it took me to a blank white page at 

http://www.nashope.com/account/signup

When I refreshed this page it took me there

http://www.nashope.com/Internals/ERROR_HANDLER?aspxerrorpath=/account/signup

Kudos to a non-standard error page but let's say I'm an average joe, this will certainly freak me out. The page is also unclear about what's happening here (500, 404, 403)? 

The URI is scary for an average joe.. "Internals", "ERROR_HANDLER", "aspxerrorpath--omg-skynet-is-alive" lol

Aside from that, great work. I don't really know if there is something up and running or if this is just a landing page but no IMHO it wont compete with Facebook, sorry.

Tamer Salem No, I don't want my grandma to use a *nix system. The world would be in danger. Some people shouldn't have access to a terminal session
